const response = await client.search({
  query: {
    rule: {
      match_criteria: {
        user_query: "pugs",
      },
      ruleset_ids: ["my-ruleset"],
      organic: {
        match: {
          description: "puggles",
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
